short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension overlay for GAM360 displaying an easy to review sponsorship calendar.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension overlay for GAM360 displaying an easy to review sponsorship calendar. With the click of a button, a calendar will overlay on top of the userâ€™s GAM360 dashboard showing all takeover (Sponsorship P4) line items scheduled. The calendar can display many line item details including the advertiser, line item targeting details and status. The calendar also has filtering abilities so the user can customize the information and how it is displayed.
